string.name: key__phone_pause
string.comment: Label for the Pause key in the telephone keyboard layout

string.name: key__phone_wait
string.comment: Label for the Wait key in the telephone keyboard layout

string.name: media__tab__emojis
string.comment: Tab description for emojis in the media UI

string.name: media__tab__emoticons
string.comment: Tab description for emoticons in the media UI

string.name: smartbar__quick_action__open_settings
string.comment: Content-description for the settings quick action in Smartbar

string.name: settings__help
string.comment: General label for help buttons in Settings

string.name: settings__default
string.comment: General string which is used when a preference has the default value set

string.name: settings__system_default
string.comment: General string which is used when a preference has the system default value set

string.name: settings__localization__subtype_add_title
string.comment: Title of subtype dialog when adding a new subtype

string.name: settings__localization__subtype_edit_title
string.comment: Title of subtype dialog when editing an existing subtype

string.name: settings__localization__subtype_error_already_exists
string.comment: Error message shown in subtype dialog when a subtype to add already exists

string.name: pref__theme__mode__label
string.comment: Label of the theme mode preference

string.name: pref__theme__day
string.comment: Label of the day group (day means light theme)

string.name: pref__theme__night
string.comment: Label of the night group (night means dark theme)

string.name: pref__theme__any_theme__label
string.comment: Label of the theme selector preference

string.name: pref__advanced__settings_theme__label
string.comment: Label of Settings theme preference in Advanced

string.name: pref__advanced__settings_theme__light
string.comment: Possible value of Settings theme preference in Advanced

string.name: pref__advanced__settings_theme__dark
string.comment: Possible value of Settings theme preference in Advanced

string.name: pref__advanced__show_app_icon__label
string.comment: Label of Show app icon preference in Advanced

string.name: about__app_icon_content_description
string.comment: Content description of app icon in About

string.name: about__view_licenses
string.comment: Label of View licenses button in About

string.name: about__view_privacy_policy
string.comment: Label of View privacy policy button in About

string.name: about__view_source_code
string.comment: Label of View source code button in About

string.name: crash_dialog__close
string.comment: Label of Close button in crash dialog
